values: 洗澡；泡澡；沐浴；洗浴；<英>浴缸；澡盆；浴器；浴锅；缸；盆；池；洗澡水；一缸液体；[摄]药液；胶卷冲洗液；巴思（希伯来古液量单位）；（Bath）巴斯（英国城市）
（baths）澡堂；公共浴室；（室内）公共游泳池

word_group.brief_definition: (在交易中)蒙受经济损失；洗澡, 沐浴
蒸汽浴室；蒸汽浴；桑拿浴
土耳其浴，蒸汽浴；土耳其浴浴室，蒸汽浴室

bilingual.source: It depends on how long you spend in the shower and how large your bath is.
bilingual.target: 这取决于你洗澡的时间和浴缸的大小。

bilingual.source: Albert Jones, a small, thin boy with an anxious face, was struggling to carry a large bucket of water upstairs for his mistress's bath.
bilingual.target: 阿尔伯特·琼斯，一个瘦小的男孩，正努力把一大桶水搬到楼上给他的女主人洗澡。
我每天晚上都会去洗澡。

bilingual.source: We go to the bath every week.
bilingual.target: 我们每周都会去澡堂洗澡。

bilingual.source: It's too hot, I need to take a bath.
bilingual.target: 天气太热了，我需要去洗澡。

bilingual.source: The dog was covered in sud after the bath.
bilingual.target: 狗洗澡后全身都是泡沫。

bilingual.source: The kids like to take a bath before bed.
bilingual.target: 孩子们喜欢在睡前去洗澡。

bilingual.source: The dog shook off the suds after his bath.
bilingual.target: 狗狗洗澡后抖掉了肥皂泡。

bilingual.source: The dog was covered in lather after its bath.
bilingual.target: 狗洗澡后全身都是泡沫。

bilingual.source: The bird will preen its feathers after a bath.
bilingual.target: 鸟儿洗澡后会整理羽毛。

list.abstract: bath（英[bɑːθ]，美[bæθ]），英语单词。作名词时，释义为浴缸；浴盆；洗澡。作动词时，释义为给…洗盆浴；洗澡。短语搭配为take a bath（蒙受经济损失；洗澡, 沐浴）。例句：Oh, I was taking a bath at that time.（哦，那时我正在洗澡。） 其复数为baths，现在分词为bathing，过去式为bathed。作名词时，其近义词有ablutions、bagnio。

yingyinNormal.en: At bath time, George shares his bath with Mr. Dinosaur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗澡的时候，乔治和恐龙先生一起洗。

yingyinNormal.en: At bath time, George shares his bath with Mr. Dinosaur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗澡的时候，乔治和恐龙先生一起洗。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bath time. Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗澡时间到了！佩佩想穿着她的新鞋，即使是去洗澡。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bath time. Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗澡时间到了。但佩琪不想脱下新鞋子，想穿着它洗澡。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bath time. Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 洗澡时间到了。但佩奇不想脱下新鞋子，想穿着它洗澡。

yingyinNormal.en: Simba. I'm kind of in the middle of a bath. And it's time for yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 辛巴，我现在正在洗澡啊你也该洗澡罗。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, bath time I think. Baby Alexander is having a bath. This is Mr. Dinosaur. Can you say dinosaur? Go-go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是的，我想他该洗澡了。小宝宝亚历山大要洗澡了。这个就是恐龙，你会说恐龙这个词吗？公公！

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa. George. Bath time. Daddy. Mummy. We found the biggest muddy puddle in the world. I can see that. Quick, into the bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇，乔治，该洗澡了。爸爸，妈妈，我们找到了世界上最大的一个泥坑。我看见泥坑了。快，进来洗澡。

yingyinNormal.en: I wore them in bed, in the bath, all summer long.
yingyinNormal.zh: 睡觉也穿着，洗澡也穿着，整个夏天都穿着。

yingyinNormal.en: George wants to play with Dino Roar in the bath. George, if you get Dino Roar wet, he'll stop working. George cannot play with Dino Roar in the bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治想在洗澡的时候和轰鸣龙一起玩。乔治，如果你把轰鸣龙弄湿了，他就会坏掉的。乔治也不能再洗澡的时候和轰鸣龙一起玩。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. I know where he is. George always has Mr. Dinosaur with him in the bath. So Mr. Dinosaur is in the bath. Mr. Dinosaur is not in the bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，我知道他在哪里了。乔治总是在洗澡的时候让恐龙先生陪着。所以恐龙先生是在浴缸里。恐龙先生不在浴缸里。

yingyinNormal.en: I know. I know where he is. George always has Mr. Dinosaur with him in the bath. So Mr. Dinosaur is in the bath. Mr. Dinosaur is not in the bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，我知道他在哪里了。乔治总是在洗澡的时候让恐龙先生陪着。所以恐龙先生是在浴缸里。恐龙先生不在浴缸里。

yingyinNormal.en: We found the biggest muddy puddle in the world. I can see that. Quick, into the bath.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们找到了世界上最大的一个泥坑。我看见泥坑了。快，进来洗澡。

yingyinNormal.en: All right. But you must come in when we call you for your bath. I don't know where they get their energy from.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧。但是我们叫你们洗澡的时候你们必须进来。我不知道他们哪里来的精力。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, can't we just stay in the bath a little bit longer. Bathtime is over! Now, it's time to clean your teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，我们不能再在浴缸里多呆一会儿吗？洗澡时间结束了！现在，该清洁你们的牙齿了。

yingyinNormal.en: That's enough splashing. Let's get you dry and into your pajamas. Oh, can't we just stay in the bath for a little bit longer. Bath time is over. Now, it's time to clean your teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别再玩了，快停下。快出来擦干把睡衣穿上。我们可以在浴缸里多呆一会儿吗，妈妈？洗澡时间结束，现在是刷牙时间。

yingyinNormal.en: That's enough splashing. Let's get you dry and into your pajamas. Oh, can't we just stay in the bath for a little bit longer. Bath time is over. Now, it's time to clean your teeth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别再玩了，快停下。快出来擦干把睡衣穿上。我们可以在浴缸里多呆一会儿吗，妈妈？洗澡时间结束，现在是刷牙时间。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. What's wrong? I drew my own bath, but I did it wrong. The water's tepid. The salt didn't dissolve and is now lodged places.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？我自己放洗澡水，但我没有弄对水温温的，浴盐无法溶解，现在它们结块了。

yingyinNormal.en: Bath time. Oh, but what if the birdies come back? Don't worry, Peppa. I'll make sure the birds don't eat the seeds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇乔治来洗澡了！哦，要是小鸟又回来吃种子怎么办？别担心佩奇，我来看着不让小鸟吃掉种子。

yingyinNormal.en: Before bedtime, Peppa and George have their bath. Peppa likes splashing. George likes splashing. Peppa and George both like splashing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 睡觉之前，佩奇和乔治要洗澡。佩奇喜欢泼水，乔治也喜欢泼水，佩奇和乔治都喜欢泼水。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Pain relieving creams don't work, but a hot shower, or warm <highlight>bath</highlight> can provide some relief.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 止疼药膏没有效果，但是洗个热水澡或洗个热水澡可以缓解疼痛。

examination_example.sentence: Betsan Corkhill, a wellness coach in <highlight>Bath</highlight>, England established a website, Stitchlinks, to explore the value of what she calls therapeutic knitting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国巴斯的健康教练贝赞·科克希尔建立了一个名为“Stitchlinks”的网站，探索她所说的治疗性针织的价值。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 浴室; [pl.]洗澡处; 温泉浴场

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Bath</highlight> & Stonehenge including entrance fees to the ancient Roman bathrooms and Stonehenge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 包含古罗马浴室和巨石阵门票的“洗浴&巨石阵”项目。

examination_example.sentence: Visit the city with over 2,000 years of history and <highlight>Bath</highlight> Abbey, the Royal Crescent and the Costume Museum.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参观这座拥有2000多年历史的城市，还有巴斯修道院、皇家新月会和服装博物馆。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 浴室; [pl.]洗澡处; 温泉浴场

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 洗澡，沐浴；遭受严重经济损失

examination_example.sentence: Oh, I was taking a <highlight>bath</highlight> at that time.
People in the Tang Dynasty celebrated the festival by taking a <highlight>bath</highlight> in the river.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 唐朝的人们通过在河里洗澡来庆祝节日。

examination_example.sentence: Then you can take a warm-water <highlight>bath</highlight> to relax.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，您可以洗个热水澡放松身心。

sense_info_list.zh: 浴室; [pl.]洗澡处; 温泉浴场

examination_example.sentence: Last August we were on vacation at Diana’s <highlight>Baths</highlight>, a place famous for waterfalls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去年八月，我们在戴安娜浴场度假，这是一个以瀑布而闻名的地方

examination_example.sentence: However, the exhibitions there will tell you the history of the Roman <highlight>Baths</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，那里的展览将告诉您罗马浴场的历史。

examination_example.sentence: The city got its name from the Roman <highlight>Baths</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这座城市的名字来自于罗马浴场。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Bath</highlight> is a city where Jane Austen once lived.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴斯是简·奥斯丁曾经居住的城市。

examination_example.sentence: The passage is mainly about the buildings in <highlight>Bath</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这篇文章主要是关于巴斯的建筑物。

examination_example.sentence: When visiting <highlight>Bath</highlight>, you can’t miss these two sites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去巴斯观光时，你不能错过这两个景点。

examination_example.sentence: She said that people often made themselves ill, just from drinking or <highlight>bathing</highlight> in dirty water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说，人们因经常在肮脏的水中喝酒或洗澡而生病。

examination_example.sentence: He likes <highlight>bathing</highlight>, and to be near a lake or running water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他喜欢洗澡，喜欢在河流附近或者是流动的水流中。
